data.name: Page_AskForContacts_Question
data.value: How do you want to manage birthdays?

data.name: Help_UseContacts_Content_1
data.value:
When you enable "Contacts as source", Birthday Reminder will read birthdays from your phone's contact list.
This allows you to: â€¢ Automatically import birthdays from your contacts â€¢ Keep your birthday list synchronized with your contacts â€¢ Avoid manually entering birthdays that are already stored in your contacts

data.name: Help_UseContacts_Content_2
data.value: The app will only read birthday information - no other contact data is accessed or stored.

data.name: Help_BirthdayCalendar_Content_1
data.value:
The "Birthday Calendar" option reads birthdays from your device's birthday calendar.
Some phones automatically create a birthday calendar from your contacts. This option allows Birthday Reminder to import birthdays from that calendar.

data.name: Help_BirthdayCalendar_Content_2
data.value: This is useful if: â€¢ Your contacts don't have birthday fields â€¢ You already maintain a separate birthday calendar â€¢ You want to import birthdays without giving full contact access

data.name: Help_BirthdayWithoutYear_Content_1
data.value:
You can save a birthday with or without a year.
If you don't know the birth year, simply choose "Without year" when selecting the date. The year will be displayed as "0000".

data.name: Help_BirthdayWithoutYear_Content_2
data.value: When a birthday has no year: â€¢ No age will be calculated or displayed â€¢ The reminder will still work normally â€¢ You can add the year later by editing the birthday

data.name: Settings_ContactsReadWrite
data.value: Contacts as source and write back

data.name: Settings_ReadCalendars_Desc
data.value: Import birthday events from your calendars

data.name: Settings_WriteCalendars_Desc
data.value: Create birthday events in your calendars

data.name: Permission_ContactsRead_Denied
data.value: Contact read permission is required for this feature. Please enable it in settings.

data.name: Permission_ContactsWrite_Denied
data.value: Contact write permission is required for this feature. Please enable it in settings.

data.name: Permission_CalendarRead_Denied
data.value: Calendar read permission is required for this feature. Please enable it in settings.

data.name: Permission_CalendarWrite_Denied
data.value: Calendar write permission is required for this feature. Please enable it in settings.

data.name: Welcome_1_Text_1
data.value: From now on, remember every important birthday with our help.

data.name: Welcome_1_Text_2
data.value: First, we need to configure some important settings.

data.name: Settings_Timezone_Hint
data.value: We recommend to set the timezone to your main location to ensure that reminders arrive at an appropriate time.

data.name: Detail_AgeOnThatDay
data.value: He / she will turn {0} on that day

data.name: Detail_RemindersSet
data.value: You will be reminded as follows:

data.name: Privacy_Text_1
data.value: Your birthday data is stored locally on your device only.

data.name: Privacy_Text_2
data.value: If you choose to sync with contacts, we only read birthday information and names. We never upload your data to any server.

data.name: Privacy_Text_3
data.value: All data remains on your device and under your control.

data.name: Start2_Text_1
data.value: Each of your contacts has a birthday field in addition to first and last name.

data.name: Start2_Text_2
data.value: Do you want to use that or stay completely separate and enter everything new here?

data.name: Start2_AskNextPage
data.value: Ask for options on next page

data.name: Start3_ReadAlwaysAskWrite
data.value: Always read and ask before writing

data.name: Start3_ReadAlwaysWrite
data.value: Always read and always create or update contact

data.name: Permission_DeniedInfo
data.value: The permission was already denied. The dialog cannot be shown again. Please go to your device settings to grant the permission manually.

data.name: Start5_ReminderQuestion
data.value: Do you want to be reminded on the exact day or also three days before or even 3 times?

data.name: Start5_ManualNote
data.value: This can also be set manually for each entry

data.name: SearchPerson_Description
data.value: Search for an existing entry or create a new one.

data.name: Error_NameRequired
data.value: Please enter at least a first or last name.

data.name: ReminderSettings_Description
data.value: Configure your reminders. Tap a card to edit.

data.name: ReminderTemplate_Email_Today
ReminderTemplate_WhatsApp_Today
data.value: Hey! {Name} has a birthday today ({Date})! ðŸŽ‚ {AgeText}

data.name: ReminderTemplate_Email_Tomorrow
ReminderTemplate_WhatsApp_Tomorrow
data.value: Hey! {Name} has a birthday tomorrow ({Date})! ðŸŽ‚ {AgeText}

data.name: ReminderTemplate_Email_InDays
ReminderTemplate_Sms_InDays
data.value: Reminder: {Name} has a birthday in {Days} days ({Date})! {AgeText}

data.name: ReminderTemplate_WhatsApp_InDays
data.value: Hey! {Name} has a birthday in {Days} days ({Date})! ðŸŽ‚ {AgeText}

data.name: ReminderTemplate_Signal_InDays
data.value: Reminder: {Name} has a birthday in {Days} days ({Date})! {AgeText}

data.name: Help_FreeReminders_Content_1
data.value:
The following reminder methods are free to use:
â€¢ Push Notification - Appears on your lock screen â€¢ Phone Alarm - Plays an alarm sound â€¢ Email - Limited number of free emails per month â€¢ Signal - Message via Signal messenger

data.name: Help_FreeReminders_Content_2
data.value: Please note: â€¢ Email reminders are free with a limited number per month. For unlimited emails, a subscription is required. â€¢ Signal integration depends on third-party availability and cannot be permanently guaranteed.

data.name: SelectTicketType_Header
data.value: What would you like to do?

data.name: Ticket_SavedOffline
data.value: Your ticket has been saved and will be sent when you're online.

data.name: Help_ReminderNotification_Content_1
data.value: Push notifications appear on your lock screen and in the notification center on the day of the reminder.

data.name: Help_ReminderNotification_Content_2
data.value: This feature is completely free and works offline. Make sure notifications are enabled in your device settings.

data.name: Help_ReminderAlarm_Content_1
data.value: An alarm will sound on your phone at the specified time to remind you of the birthday.

data.name: Help_ReminderAlarm_Content_2
data.value: You can even set the alarm to sound when your phone is in silent mode. But by default, this doesn't happen.

data.name: Help_ReminderEmail_Content_1
data.value: You will receive an email reminder at the specified time before the birthday.

data.name: Help_ReminderEmail_Content_2
data.value: The free plan includes a limited number of emails per month. For unlimited emails, a subscription is required.

data.name: Help_ReminderSignal_Content_1
data.value: You will receive a message via Signal Messenger to remind you of the birthday.

data.name: Help_ReminderSignal_Content_2
data.value: This service is currently offered free of charge. However, continued availability cannot be permanently guaranteed as it depends on third-party services.

data.name: Help_ReminderSms_Content_1
data.value: You will receive an SMS message to remind you of the birthday.

data.name: Help_ReminderSms_Content_2
data.value: This feature requires an active subscription. SMS messages incur costs that are covered by your subscription.

data.name: Help_ReminderWhatsApp_Content_1
data.value: You will receive a WhatsApp message to remind you of the birthday.

data.name: Help_ReminderWhatsApp_Content_2
data.value: This feature requires an active subscription. WhatsApp Business API costs are covered by your subscription.

data.name: Help_Timezone_Note
data.value: The timezone {0} means {1} ({2}). You can change your timezone anytime in settings.

data.name: PurchaseAbo_Description
data.value: Unlock all reminder methods with a subscription. SMS and WhatsApp reminders require an active subscription.

data.name: PurchaseAbo_ComingSoon
data.value: In-app purchases will be available soon.

data.name: Tz_Cities_America_SaoPaulo
data.value: Sao Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Brasilia

data.name: BrokenVersion_Header
data.value: This version doesn't work on your device.

data.name: BrokenVersion_Info
data.value: We have been automatically notified and are working on a solution.

data.name: Error_GenericMessage
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

data.name: NoInternet_Message
data.value: Please check your connection and try again.

data.name: Page_SyncContacts_Info
data.value: New contacts have been found that are not yet in your birthday list.
